Package authoring

Class ColourMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • authoring.ColourMapper
  • public class ColourMapper
extends java.lang.Object
    This a utility class is used to create a mapping between location tags in the scenario and their text colour. There method cycles between 11 set colours to use in the mappings. The goal is to make sure all commands that use the same location tag are coloured the same.
    Since:
    2017-04-01
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Dilshad Khatri, Alvis Koshy, Drew Noel, Jonathan Tung

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.awt.Color> colourMap
      Mapper from location tags to colors.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ColourMapper()
      Constructor to initialize colourMap

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addColourMapping​(java.util.List<PlayerCommand> commands)
      This method iterates over a list of commands, and if it sees any location tags that aren't in colourMap, it will add a new colour mapping for it.
      java.awt.Color getColour​(java.lang.String locationTag)
      This method returns the colour mapping for a given location tag.

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.awt.Color> colourMap

    • Method Detail

      • addColourMapping

        public void addColourMapping​(java.util.List<PlayerCommand> commands)
        This method iterates over a list of commands, and if it sees any location tags that aren't in colourMap, it will add a new colour mapping for it.
        Parameters:
        commands - list of commands from the scenario

      • getColour

        public java.awt.Color getColour​(java.lang.String locationTag)
        This method returns the colour mapping for a given location tag.
        Parameters:
        locationTag - the location tag in the event's description
        Returns:
        the colour mapped to that location tag
